articles.author: Kathryn  Watson
articles.title: Trump responds to "traitor" Marjorie Taylor Greene after "60 Minutes" interview - CBS News
articles.description: President Trump said Georgia Republican Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene is "not AMERICA FIRST or MAGA" and also attacked "60 Minutes" and Paramount in a social media post.
articles.content: Washington — President Trump lambasted former ally Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene on Truth Social Monday morning, after the Georgia Republican told CBS News' "60 Minutes" the president has forsaken his … [+3202 chars]
